channel.title: Enso II - The 2011 RS Based RSPS [Flawless Content]
channel.description:
[u][b]I'm currently in Military which means I have not so much time to do updates for Enso. Anyways I will do my best when I have time. For now I focus to add RS-only content and do bug fixing.[/b][/u]
[B] Enso II - 2011 Based RSPS[/B]
[img]http://puu.sh/5ml6D.jpg[/img]
[B]Details[/B] Framework: Hyperion / Matrix / RSE (This is Matrix based but I took some shit from RSE, Hyperion). Cache: 667 Loading 667 (Original cache).
[B]Latest Updates:[/B] [B] Media[/B] [img]http://i43.tinypic.com/2ic1649.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/5c71M.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/5byeP.jpg[/img] [img]http://i41.tinypic.com/2mq86kn.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/5cY3Q.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/5l2Id.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/5ml15.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/4hsQm.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/5xI4H.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/5LiSF.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/62ech.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/62fHF.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/62i04.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/68xPc.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/5LetH.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/5Lerw.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/5Mrx9.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/5EQEo.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/5EQEM.jpg[/img]
Updates: I came back from army for this weekend. I didn't add much but atleast something. All pickables (Potatoes, wheat, cabbage, flower, etc) [img]http://puu.sh/6p6zX.jpg[/img]
Flax added. [img]http://puu.sh/6p6E8.jpg[/img] Implemented RSE's Region handling and pathfinding.
-Duel ring transportation. -Games necklace transportation. -Finished Ship charter. -Finished gnome transportation (to ape a toll). -Every single pickable in-game is added. -Flax picking is actual profit. -Granite mining. -Finished musician resting. -Cooking is re-written. -Ash scattering.
[img]http://puu.sh/6WU9X.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/6WUe8.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/6WUkm.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/6WUmQ.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/6WU2T.jpg[/img]
I have worked on a bit on combat, specially instant attack weapons.
-Granite maul added and finished. -Dragon battleaxe finished.
[img]http://puu.sh/6Ya9O.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/6YacP.jpg[/img]
-Every single item set / skill pack is added to Enso. -Potion mixing is finished and added.
[img]http://puu.sh/7fXrz.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/7fXxO.jpg[/img]
Converted RSE's combat system. :)
Fixed a very annyoing thing which you see in every single Matrix in this planet. When you interact with a NPC from a distance, the player just walks to the clicked target. Not anymore in Enso II.
Upon NPC click / interact from distance the character actually faces the target. [img]http://puu.sh/7nB1d.jpg[/img]
Also I had to add resetting it to walking packet. I have no idea why this wasn't already added in Matrix.
[b] Feel free to comment about Enso II what you think, I would love to know.[/b] :)
[b] Release Date[/b]: Unkown.

item.title: Enso II - The 2011 RS Based RSPS [Flawless Content]
item.dc:creator: @FuzenSeth FuzenSeth
item.description:
@FuzenSeth wrote:

I don’t still get it? It’s stat spy magic spell.
[/quote]
He probably thought it was a bad modification to the regular skill interface (as did I)[/quote]

OH haha.
http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Stat_Spy

EDIT: I have got more information now about the release date of Enso.

Release date: 5.7.2014! Stay tuned!

item.title: Enso II - The 2011 RS Based RSPS [Flawless Content]
item.dc:creator: @FuzenSeth FuzenSeth
item.description:
@FuzenSeth wrote:

The following content is added / started / improved
Sandwich lady random event added.
Evil twin random event added.
Beekeeper random event added.
Mike random event added.
Miles and Giles random event added.
Quiz master random event added.
Sergeant drill random event added.

Random events can occur almost anywhere, except places like soul wars, barrows, pest control, basically almost any mini game, clan wars, in the wild and some other places that I can’t think of off the top of my head, but I have them typed up in a notepad document somewhere (lol). Random events can range from 1-10 minutes, depending on how fast the player completes them, and if the player completes the event in a certain amount of time, they return to their previous location along with a gift. If not, they get teleported to a random, dark part of enso where nobdoy comes back from! (I’m kidding, lol).

Media of the updates.















Current Devopment Team

Core & content developer
Fuzen Seth

Core & content developer
Lucifer

Website developer & Community manager
Marcbob

Community manager
Shortyy

Read full topic

item.title: Enso II - The 2011 RS Based RSPS [Flawless Content]
item.dc:creator: @FuzenSeth FuzenSeth
item.description:
@FuzenSeth wrote:

[21.6.2014]
A lot of big stuff was done today.

*NPC Combat script handling finished.
*Player combat finished.
*Switching timers is perfect.
*Game tick corrected.
*NPC deaths are handled now properly.
*Player combat delays corrected.
*Player combat hits rates corrected.
*You can no longer pick items from a longer distances. You can only loot at the item’s tile.

Added full RS Clan Wars.

Dangerous portal

Safe portal

Team fights

Added full Ourania Altar (Probably best runecrafting experience in game.)


Added real RS Dicing.

Main world teleportation ‘layout’ finished

Current teleportation design.

Read full topic
item.source: Enso II - The 2011 RS Based RSPS [Flawless Content]

item.title: Enso II - The 2011 RS Based RSPS [Flawless Content]
item.dc:creator: @FuzenSeth FuzenSeth
item.description:
@FuzenSeth wrote:

[B]Added rock crab points.[/B]

[B]Reward store contains[/B]
-Experience boosts.
-Costumes.
-Special items.

[B]Media[/B]

Main display

Updating

Finished updating

Going do the store next. It makes training more fun that you can get points and buy experience boost.

Experience boost prices:
30 Minute boost: 150 points.
1 Hour boost: 300 points.
2 hour boost: 600 points.

[B]The bonus experience will effect your combat stats only.[/B] Also the time is taken from your play-time not server time.

Extra info:
Also this is just a normal teleport and training area, once you get here the interface will pop-up.

Prayer scrolls are added, every one of them.
Players can now unlock Dungeoneering prayers.


These scrolls can be bought at Daemonheim, it will cost dungeoneering tokens.

I have moved the home to Edgeville. Grand Exchange will stay and players can use the shortcut to get there. Teleportation happens still at grand exchange.

EDIT: Added chinchompas.

EDIT 2:
Added a world-wide teleportation system. (It’s not finished though, i’m adding the locations currently).

Wise Old Man will be at edgeville (Enso’s home) he will handle teleportation. Spirit tree teleport will stay as well, but Wise Old Man is the main teleporter in Enso.
I also fixed the game tick.
I have been making some changes in whole teleport system, if you teleport under damage you won’t receive any hit during teleport. That is now fixed, also I corrected ancient teleport animation and added ending gfxes.

EDIT 3: Ape Atoll Dungeon introduction.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DKotJ8NH0IA&feature=gp-n-y&google_comment_id=z13oifpgpl3cjl2u322xhvewtrakedd5q04

More to come…

Read full topic

item.title: Enso II - The 2011 RS Based RSPS [Flawless Content]
item.dc:creator: @FuzenSeth FuzenSeth
item.description:
@FuzenSeth wrote:

I have added a teleporter called Dean Vellio to make the game easier for new players. Dean vellio will autoscan your combat level and he will send you automaticly the best training locations for your level.

Updates today:
-Quest system improvements
-Better following
-Combat improvement (added sagaie correct).
-Fixed a bug at ape a toll dungeon had problem with earthquakes hehe.
-Stat spy spell had a bug which is now fixed.
-Lag fix and server speed improvements.
-Updated netty.

[I]Dean Vellio using magical teleportation on me.[/I]

[I]Added living rock caverns.[/I]

[I]Jadinkos are added for players.[/I]

OT: Thanks arham-4 for bumping it really does help. hehe

Read full topic
